feed.title: Trend Business and Market

entry.title: The Winning Debate: Unveiling Kamala Harris as the Market's Champion
entry.summary: In the world, Kamala Harris emerged as the winner of Tuesday's debate, according to the market. Meanwhile, Treasury yields reached new lows for 2024 ahead of the CPI inflation report. In the automotive industry, a unique 1970 Ford Escort Mexico with historical connections to the Essex car factory is set to be auctioned with a guide price of Â£70k. Prime Minister Modi expressed confidence in India's resilience, stating that one can rely on the country even in challenging times. Font PR owners, Brad Stansfield and Becher Townshend, have acquired the EMRS polling firm, Pulse Tasmania. Lastly, the drop in crude oil prices is expected to boost margins, but Berger Paints CEO Abhijit Roy believes a price cut is unlikely.
